entry.tran: (可自行决定与谁发生性关系的)已达承诺年龄的
entry.def: A consenting adult is a person who is considered to be old enough to make their own decisions about who they have sex with.

example.ex: What consenting adults do in private is their own business.
example.tran: 已达承诺年龄的成年人私下进行的活动是他们自己的事。
